LanguageData.OE_FungiPlankFloor.label: fungi floor
LanguageData.OE_FungiPlankFloor.description: Excellent fungi wood flooring, beautiful enough, clean and universal due to its low chance of burning. Very easy to install.
LanguageData.OE_DragonianPlankFloor.label: dragonian floor
LanguageData.OE_DragonianPlankFloor.description: Dragonian floor is highly prized by Obsidia nobility because of its luxury. Mostly used in hunting lodges.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidianTile.label: obsidian tile
LanguageData.OE_ObsidianTile.description: Standard obsidian floor is beautiful and clean. Very difficult to lay.
LanguageData.OE_MythrilTile.label: mythril tile
LanguageData.OE_MythrilTile.description: Mythril tile is the most luxurious of the bunch and provides a small cleanliness bonus. Highly prized by Obsidia nobility.
LanguageData.OE_PlatinumTile.label: platinum tile
LanguageData.OE_PlatinumTile.description: Sterile platinum floor with special cleanliness-enhancing properties. Extra-clean rooms improve outcomes in hospitals and research labs. This tile is very slow to build, but quick to clean.
LanguageData.OE_EmpyriumTile.label: empyrium tile
LanguageData.OE_EmpyriumTile.description: Empyrium tile is the most luxurious of the bunch and provides a cleanliness bonus. Highly prized by Obsidia nobility.
LanguageData.OE_OrichalcumTile.label: orichalcum tile
LanguageData.OE_OrichalcumTile.description: Orichalcum tile is the most luxurious of the bunch and provides a cleanliness bonus. Highly prized by Obsidia nobility.
LanguageData.OE_Crystal_TilledSoil.label: crystal tilled soil
LanguageData.OE_Crystal_TilledSoil.description: Triple efficient tilled soil with Sinterius. Costly but effective Obsidia technique.
LanguageData.OE_Crystal_TilledSoil.tools.dirt.label: dirt
LanguageData.OE_ObsidianHexTile.label: obsidian matrix tile
LanguageData.OE_ObsidianHexTile.description: Standard obsidian matrix tile is beautiful and clean. Very difficult to lay.
LanguageData.OE_MythrilHexTile.label: mythril matrix tile
LanguageData.OE_MythrilHexTile.description: Mythril matrix tile is the most luxurious of the bunch and provides a small cleanliness bonus. Highly prized by Obsidia nobility.
LanguageData.OE_PlatinumHexTile.label: platinum matrix tile
LanguageData.OE_PlatinumHexTile.description: Sterile platinum matrix tile with special cleanliness-enhancing properties. Extra-clean rooms improve outcomes in hospitals and research labs. This tile is very slow to build, but quick to clean.
LanguageData.OE_EmpyriumHexTile.label: empyrium matrix tile
LanguageData.OE_EmpyriumHexTile.description: Empyrium matrix tile is the most luxurious of the bunch and provides a cleanliness bonus. Highly prized by Obsidia nobility.
LanguageData.OE_OrichalcumHexTile.label: orichalcum matrix tile
LanguageData.OE_OrichalcumHexTile.description: Orichalcum matrix tile is the most luxurious of the bunch and provides a cleanliness bonus. Highly prized by Obsidia nobility.
